casebody.data:
UNITED STATES ex rel. John WERTH, Relator-Appellant, v. Benjamin M. DAY, as Commissioner, etc., Respondent-Appellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 7, 1930. No. 235. J. Waisman, of New York City (Harold Van Riper, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Charles H. Tuttle, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Leon E. Spencer, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON and L. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
